1.content: One day Rose and her best friend Sally were walking together when they found a treasure map, "yes I have been waiting to go on another treasure hunt" Rose said happily. "Yea me to" Sally replied, the two girls decided to follow the treasure map, where did the map take them?
1.title: The Treasure Maps

11.content: The map leads the girls to a ocean shore "hmm the treasure must be under the water" Rose said, "yea your right" Sally replied. The 2 girls saw a diving shop close so they went there and bought some equipment to use and they slipped them on and went back to the spot on the shore and jumped in and swam around until they found a cave, the girls enter the cave and swim until they hear a sound behind them.
11.title: Underwater Cave

12.content: The girls come to a jungle and they follow the map till they come to a cave "the treasures in there" Rose said happily "then let's go" Sally replied excited. The girls enter the cave and its dark so Rose gets out their flashlight and they continue till they come to a split on the path "which way do we go?" Sally asked Rose looked at each path, Rose decided...
12.title: The Jungle

13.content:
"This place gives me the creeps..." said Rose.

"Come on, don't be a chicken! Let's find some treasure!" said Sally.

They made their way into the castle. It was very dark and old with many spiderwebs.

"Hmm... There's too many ways to go! Let's split up, we'll find the treasure quicker that way!" said Sally.

"Are you nuts? Split up in this creepy place? I don't think so..."
13.title: A Castle

131.content: Rose finally agreed to splitting up. Do you want to see Rose's side of the story, or Sally's?
131.title: Split up

choices: Looked under the rack and found Rose
Turned around and went out of the room
1311.content: Rose walked down a long corridor till she came to some steps, she walked down the stairs and opened a door. Rose looked around inside the door and it looked like a dungeon, there was rack, some shackles on the wall, and a pair of stocks. Curious, Rose looked around the room trying to find any clues that might lead her to the treasure. Then Rose heard a noise, she quickly hid under the rack table and soon she saw someone come in, she peeked out from under the table to get a better look and she saw 2 girls that looked to be around Roses age but they didn't look like normal girls, she could see straight thru them. "Ghosts" Rose thought to herself, she didn't believe in ghosts until now, she was quiet as the 2 ghost girls wandered around the room talking to each other "I thought I heard someone in here" the first girl said "me to" the second girl replied, they started looking behind things and Rose started shivering scared hoping they wouldn't find her. Finally the 2 girls came over to the rack and...
1311.title: Rose

13111.content: Unfortunately for Rose the 2 ghost girls bent down and looked under the rack and found her, they grabbed her legs and pulled her out "well i thought i heard someone in here" the first girl said "it seems we have a trespasser in our castle" the second girl replied. "What do you mean" Rose asked scared "I thought this place was deserted", the 2 ghost girls laughed and the first one said "no its true no one lives here now but we used to live here when we were alive, we were the daughters of a rich man and women but one day some knights invaded our castle and killed us, our parents got away but they couldn't find us when the invasion happened so we didn't make it out". The second ghost girl continues by saying "So now our spirits live here to make sure anyone who ever trespasses on our castle again is punished, and we think you deserve a punishment", Rose immediately jumps up and runs to get away but is quickly caught by her legs and falls to the floor. "no no you cant leave yet, not until you've learned your lesson" the 2 girls say in unison. The girls pick Rose up and take her to the...
13111.title: Looked under the rack and found Rose

choices: They rub baby oil all over her feet
They move up to her belly
131111.content: The 2 girls lift Rose up and tie her in a Y position on the rack, then the girls go to Roses feet and take off her shoes and socks. Rose closes her eyes as her shoes and socks are taken off, after they are off Rose immediately curls her toes because she then knows what they are going to do to her, and her feet are her most ticklish spot, the ghost girls look at each other then smile "well it looks like these feet are ticklish, I think we are going to have fun" Rose struggles trying to get free but to no avail so she just lays there and waits for her torture. The ghost girls start spidering their fingers all over Rose's soles and Rose bites her lip and tries to hold back the laughter but then one of the girls hit her most ticklish spot on her feet, right under her toes and Rose scream's in laughter. The girls tickle her feet with their fingers for about 10min then they decided to try something else...
131111.title: Rack

choices: Sally gets Rose untied and the two friends run out of the room
The two ghost girls grab Sally and lock her in the shackles and stocks
1311111.content: "I think we should take this up a notch" the first ghost girl says, "yea I agree" the second girl replies then the first girl grabs some baby oil and drenches Rose's feet with it then the second ghost girl grabs some electric toothbrushes and hands the first girl one of them. The first girl smiles and says "Lets continue" so the two ghost girls turn on the toothbrushes and place them on Rose's feet and Rose screamed hysterically, Rose couldn't believe how much this tickled it was worse than she ever experienced before, she didn't know how long she could take this. The ghost girls giggled as they watched poor Rose try as hard as she could to wiggle out of the bonds but she wasn't getting anywhere, Rose was going crazy moving her feet as much as she could and her head back and forth as she endured the torture she was being put through. Now Rose was sweating and cursing a little as tears went down her face, then when she thought she was about to pass out everyone heard a door open and the girls stopped tickling Rose and looked back and they saw Sally. Sally just stared at the two ghost girls that were torturing her best friend "What are you doing to my friend" Sally asked angrily, "we were just making her laugh, there's no need to get upset" the first girl replied. Sally looked at Rose and saw her friend breathing heavily "your torturing her is what your doing" then Sally runs at the girls and goes right through them and tries to untie Rose as fast as she can then...
1311111.title: 10 Times Worse

choices: Rose wakes up in Lilith's room
13112.content:
After a while the ghost girls left the room. Rose came out from hiding and sighed with relief. But when she decided to leave the room, the door suddenly opened.
Rose jumped back and tried to hide but then she heard a someone's voice "Well, who do we have here?". Rose knew it was pointless to hide now, so she turned around a saw a young looking woman with pointy hat and dark clothes."W...Who are you?"asked Rose. "I asked you first." strange woman replied. "My name is Rose." "And my name is Lilith, the witch. It has been a long time since someone visited my castle, around two hundred years I think."
Then surprised Rose asked "You are more than two hundred years old?!". The witch then said in proud tone "Yeah, I don't seem like such an old hag, right? It's because I make myself an immortality potion, I won't die or age, but enough about me. Why did you come here girl?" The witch wouldn't be happy to hear that she is a treasure hunter so Rose said "Well... I got lost and then I saw this castle... and wanted to ask for directions."
The witch suddenly smiled in evil way "Oh yeah? You can't fool me girl, I can sense lies easily. You probably are after my treasures, am I right?" Lilith's eyes magically flashed bright red while she said that. Rose nodded even though she didn't wanted to. "Just as I though. What should I do with you?" The witch thought for a moment and said "Hmm... This will be fun. But for now girl, just sleep!" Lilith's eyes flashed red again and Rose fallen asleep.

What happens now?
13112.title: A witch?!

choices: Witch uses some kind of spell to tickle Rose
131121.content:
Rose opened her eyes and looked around. She noticed that she was sitting on a chair with her legs on a stool in front of her and her hands tied behind her. For some reason she was unable to move her legs even though they were not tied to anything. The room was different from the rest of the castle, most of the stuff was luxurious and looked like new. Then finally she saw Lilith who was sitting on nearby sofa.
"You finally woke up, girl. I was getting bored already." said the witch. "What are going to do with me?!" shouted Rose. "Calm down, girl. I won't eat you or anything. I will just have some fun with you." said Lilith as she came closer to Rose. "Where are you most ticklish?" Witch asked with an evil smile."I won't tell you!" Said Rose trying to act brave, even though in reality she was frightened as hell. "You won't? I wouldn't have been so sure about that." Witch said and her eyes flashed red "M...My feet" said Rose against her own will.
"That's great. I always enjoyed having fun with feet of cute girls like you." Said Lilith and came closer to Rose's feet "Wearing socks and sandals? Interesting fashion you have today." commented the witch. Rose could only watch as Lilith slowly taken off one of her sandals. Then the witch moved one of her fingers on Rose's socked sole which caused Rose to giggle a little."You are ticklish even with socks on? This will be so much fun." Said the witch grinning as she taken off the other sandal.
Lilith then used her hands to tickle Rose's socked feet. Fingers of the witch were moving quickly from her heels to the toes. "HahahahhahhahaPLEASEhahahahahSTOPahahaaha" said Rose while laughing but the witch didn't listen as she continually assaulted her feet.
Lilith continued tickling her socked feet for 5 minutes and then...
131121.title: Rose wakes up in Lilith's room

choices: Witch tickles Rose's feet by licking them
Witch tickles her using something else
1311211.content:
"I want to see how ticklish that cute feet of yours without those socks."Said the witch as she grabbed the tip of one of Rose's socks and slowly taken it off. Rose knew what was coming and clenched her teeth as soon as she felt air on her foot. Lilith then taken off the other sock and stared for a second at Rose's bare feet. "Really nice pair of feet you have there, girl."Said the witch as she brought her face closer and sniffed them "And they smell nice too. It will be my pleasure to tickle them."
The witch again put her fingers on Rose's soles and started to tickle her."Hahaahhhahhahahaha PLEahaahahahhaahhaahaa!" Rose was now laughing really hard, and couldn't even beg for mercy. Witch quickly noticed that Rose's toes were her weak spot so she concentrated her assault on them. Witch's fingers tickled under and between her toes which caused Rose to laugh hysterically.
After ten minutes of this treatment Lilith stopped and looked at Rose" How is it?" She asked with that evil grin of hers. "It's horrible. Stop it and let me go." Said exhausted Rose. "Really? You looked so happy a while ago. Don't worry, when I will finish, you will start to enjoy it. Anyway what should we do now?"Said the witch as she sat on a sofa and drank some more of her tea.
1311211.title: Tickling Rose's bare feet

13112112.content:
Rose then saw Lilith undoing laces of her own knee-high boots. Witch taken them off to reveal her stockings covered feet. She slides off one stocking revealing her sexy bare foot. Then she takes a chair and puts it close to Rose's feet. She sits on that chair and turns to Rose "I wonder how will it be if I will use my own feet on yours." Saying that she brought her bare foot in front of Rose's face and wiggled her toes.
Lilith's feet were really well cared for, they looked so soft and smooth that even Rose though they were attractive. "Hehe, you like them don't you? I take a good care for all my body, to keep it looking young and attractive, so my feet are no exception." Said the witch proudly lightly brushing her own long black hair.
Lilith then brought her foot to Rose's and started lightly scratching her soles using her toes. Witch's toes wiggling and moving around cause Rose to laugh very hard again "Hahahhahaha SthhahahStop hahahahahhaahha" The witch licked her own lips and continued the attack. Lilith's foot was unbelievably skilled, at first Rose tried to scrunch her toes to stop witch from tickling her weak spot but she couldn't hold long with Lilith's toes assaulting her continuously.
Then the witch suddenly brought her stockinged foot closer to Rose's other foot. Rose didn't saw that coming because she was laughing with closed eyes. When she felt the stockings on her other foot it was too late. The stockinged foot tickled in different way because of the fabric of the stockings. "Hahahahhahahah NOhahahhahahahahahSThhahahhahSTOPhahahhaPLEASE!hahahaha"said Rose while laughing hysterically. The witch just looked as she put her toes between Rose's and continued her fun. After another ten minutes the witch stopped and came closer to Rose's feet "I haven't had so much since...well never. Only people coming to my castle were men, so I wasn't interested in them." Lilith said "Can I go home now?" asked exhausted Rose
"I don't think so, girl. I like having fun with you so you will be staying here for a while. Don't worry I will give you something to eat and drink, I said don't want to hurt or kill you. But now lets go back to those cute feet of yours." Said the witch as she knelt in front of Rose's feet. Lilith slowly licked Rose's left foot from heel to the toes, then she put her tongue between her toes. "HahahahaahWHAThahahIShahahhaTHIShahha!?" Rose said laughing. The witch stopped for a moment "From the beginning I wondered how you feet taste like, girl. I just couldn't stop myself anymore." Then Lilith started sucking Rose's big toe. The tickling sensation was worse than that before from fingers or toes. The witches tongue danced between the toes and Rose couldn't stop laughing. Lilith then started sucking her toes again from the big to the little, she then came back to licking her heel and arches for a moment and then come back to slide her tongue between Rose's toes.
Then the witch stopped and said "You feet aren't only cute and ticklish but also quite tasty.". Rose couldn't understand how someone could have though that her feet are tasty, but she was too tired to speak right now. "Okay then, girl. I guess I will give you a break. While I will read some books about tickling methods" Witch said with evil grin.
Two hours later...
13112112.title: Witch tickles Rose's feet using... her feet?!

choices: The old woman tickles Sally's tummy
1312.content:
As Sally was walking around the dark halls of the castle, she found a room.

In that room she saw a little old lady which made her gasp. She was very ugly and possibly in her 80's, her face had no make-up and was very wrinkled and covered with liverspots, and her hands were very wrinkled and gnarled, with short fingernails.

"Don't be scared of me dearie, I won't hurt you! Come inside!" said the old woman.

Sally reluctantly went in the old woman's room.

"Um, hi... I didn't know anyone still lived here." said Sally.

"It's quite alright my dear, I just love visitors! Oooh! I can see your tummy!" said the old woman as she looked at Sally's tanned stomach. Sally's white t-shirt had left some of her belly uncovered, showing half her belly button.

"Oh uh, okay...: " said Sally, not knowing how to respond.

The old woman then reached out her bony hand and placed it on Sally's lower tummy.

Sally yelped and jumped back but the old woman placed her hand on Sally's back, stopping her from getting away.

"What a nice soft tummy you got!" said the old woman as her old hand started rubbing Sally's lower belly.

"H-hey! Cut that out!" demanded Sally.

"What's wrong dear? Are you ticklish?" asked the old woman.

"Y-Yeah, I am..." said Sally.

"Then we're going to have lots of fun then!" said the old woman as she pulled up Sally's white t shirt up with one hand, revealing her whole tummy, and with the other hand pointing a shaky finger towards Sally's belly button, heading towards it.

"Oh Noooo-EEEP!" sally was interrupted by the old woman's finger poking her belly button and bent foreward, pulling her tummy in to get away from the old hand.

The old woman cackled and said "Now just come lie over here for more tummy tickling fun!" as she gently pushed Sally onto an old bed.

Sally was laying there with her whole tummy showing and staring in fear as the old woman wiggles her old bony fingers toward it
1312.title: Sally

choices: A tall, scary guy in butler's garb
13122.content:
“Eww, no! Get off! What’s wrong with you?”, cries Sally, who then rolls off the far end of the bed and, standing again, pulls her tee-shirt down as tight as she can over her sleek, sensitive tummy.

“I’m sorry, my mom always tells me to be polite to old people, but you are crazy, lady!”, says Sally, as she easily runs a wide arch around the old lady, who lunges at her, arms outstretched, fingers wiggling in anticipation of tickling her.

“Come back, my pretty! I want to tic-“[SLAM!]

Sally slams the door on the room with the crazy crone and runs down the hallway, screaming for her friend, “ROSE! Where ARE y-“[BUMP!], and runs smack dab into:
13122.title: Sally gets away

choices: They landed in a secret lab
They landed in some jail cells
132.content: "No I think we should stay together, who knows what's in this creepy castle" Rose said. "Alright" Sally replied, so the two girls walked down a long corridor until they came to a door with a sign on it that said "Do not enter" but the girls being as curious as they were ignored it and slowly opened the door and went in, they walked into the middle of the room and looked around but the room was empty. "I wonder why there would be a sign on the door if there's nothing in here" Sally said, I don't know" Rose replied then the two girls heard a click and they looked around "what was that" they both said then the floor gave way and the girls fell down a trapdoor.
132.title: Don't split up

info.brief_description: This is a story about 2 girl Treasure Hunters who get into some Ticklish situations
info.description:
The 2 girl Treasure Hunters are Rose and Sally, Rose is 15 and Sally is 14 they are best friends and they both love treasure. Rose is a brunette with a Red T-shirt, blue shorts, and sandals, Rose's most ticklish spot is her feet. Sally is a blonde with a white T- shirt that shows a little bit of her tummy, blue pants, and tennis shoes, Sally's most ticklish spot is her tummy.

The Rules for this story are:
1. No Gay/Lesbian
2. All body parts can be tickled
3. Nudity is allowed
4. Cussing is okay just don't overdue it
5. No killing off characters

Other than that Have Fun
